channel.title: Hosting?
channel.description:
well i know im a leacher but i ask people if i can leach there source and all well now i got a problem i use no-ip but how to like use it when you have router and all anybody can help me?
Reward is head admin if it works

item.title: Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

For a starter why would you want to leech?

Secondly, go to www.portforward.com and follow through the applied steps on portforwarding.
Then, download NO-IP DUC if you want to hide your ip, or so on, then update DNS host.
After you’ve done this go into client.java in your server files and search 127.0.0.1 and change that to your server ip, and for the client go into gui.java and search the same thing and change it, save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“StabbingscapeOnline, post:1, topic:365240”]well i know im a leacher but i ask people if i can leach there source and all
well now i got a problem i use no-ip but how to like use it when you have router and all and i need the exact locations where to change the ip’s in source/client.
anybody can help me?[/quote]

To be honest, you’re a dumb fuck.

Search for no-ip in your client folder yourself.

Read full topic
